animals.name: Elephant
animals.fact: Elephants are the largest land animals on Earth.

animals.name: Cheetah
animals.fact: Cheetahs are the fastest land animals, reaching speeds up to 70 mph.

animals.name: Shark
animals.fact: Sharks have been around for over 400 million years.

animals.name: Eagle
animals.fact: Eagles have excellent eyesight that allows them to spot prey from miles away.

animals.name: Panda
animals.fact: Pandas eat up to 12 hours a day and their diet is 99% bamboo.

animals.name: Penguin
animals.fact: Penguins are flightless birds that swim instead of fly.

animals.name: Crocodile
animals.fact: Crocodiles can live up to 70 years.

animals.name: Koala
animals.fact: Koalas sleep up to 20 hours a day.

animals.name: Butterfly
animals.fact: Butterflies taste with their feet.

animals.name: Whale
animals.fact: The blue whale is the largest animal ever to live on Earth.

animals.name: Lion
animals.fact: Lions are the only big cats that live in groups called prides.

animals.name: Jellyfish
animals.fact: Jellyfish have been around for over 500 million years.

animals.name: Falcon
animals.fact: The peregrine falcon is the fastest bird, reaching speeds of over 200 mph in a dive.

animals.name: Owl
animals.fact: Owls can rotate their heads up to 270 degrees.

animals.name: Snake
animals.fact: Some snakes can sense heat through specialized pits on their heads.

animals.name: Turtle
animals.fact: Sea turtles can live to be over 100 years old.

animals.name: Rabbit
animals.fact: Rabbits can turn their ears 180 degrees.

animals.name: Giraffe
animals.fact: Giraffes have the longest necks of any land animal, up to 6 feet long.

animals.name: Ant
animals.fact: Ants can carry objects 50 times their body weight.

animals.name: Dolphin
animals.fact: Dolphins are highly intelligent and can recognize themselves in mirrors.

animals.name: Peacock
animals.fact: Peacocks use their colorful feathers to attract mates.

animals.name: Alligator
animals.fact: Alligators can live up to 50 years in the wild.

animals.name: Wolf
animals.fact: Wolves are known for their complex social structures.

animals.name: Octopus
animals.fact: Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood.

animals.name: Kangaroo
animals.fact: Kangaroos can jump up to 30 feet in a single leap.

animals.name: Tiger
animals.fact: No two tigers have the same stripe pattern.

animals.name: Parrot
animals.fact: Parrots can mimic human speech.

animals.name: Hippopotamus
animals.fact: Hippos can hold their breath for up to 5 minutes underwater.

animals.name: Eel
animals.fact: Electric eels can generate shocks up to 600 volts.

animals.name: Seahorse
animals.fact: Male seahorses carry and give birth to their young.

animals.name: Bat
animals.fact: Bats are the only mammals capable of true flight.

animals.name: Crab
animals.fact: Crabs can walk sideways.

animals.name: Meerkat
animals.fact: Meerkats stand on their hind legs to spot predators.

animals.name: Starfish
animals.fact: Starfish can regenerate lost arms.

animals.name: Sloth
animals.fact: Sloths are the slowest mammals on Earth.

animals.name: Chameleon
animals.fact: Chameleons can change the color of their skin.

animals.name: Raccoon
animals.fact: Raccoons are known for their dexterous front paws.

animals.name: Antelope
animals.fact: Antelopes are known for their speed and agility.

animals.name: Platypus
animals.fact: Platypuses are one of the few mammals that lay eggs.

animals.name: Salmon
animals.fact: Salmon return to the exact spot where they were born to spawn.

animals.name: Platypus
animals.fact: Platypuses are one of the few mammals that lay eggs.

animals.name: Raccoon
animals.fact: Raccoons can open jars and locks.

animals.name: Goat
animals.fact: Goats have rectangular pupils.

animals.name: Deer
animals.fact: Deer shed and regrow their antlers every year.

animals.name: Toad
animals.fact: Some toads can secrete toxins as a defense mechanism.

animals.name: Horse
animals.fact: Horses can sleep both standing up and lying down.

animals.name: Snail
animals.fact: Some snails can sleep for three years.

animals.name: Tortoise
animals.fact: Some tortoises can live for over 150 years.

animals.name: Lizard
animals.fact: Some lizards can regenerate their tails.

animals.name: Crab
animals.fact: Crabs can walk sideways.

animals.name: Parrot
animals.fact: Parrots can mimic human speech and other sounds.

animals.name: Whale
animals.fact: The blue whale is the largest animal ever to live on Earth.

animals.name: Frog
animals.fact: Some frogs can freeze solid and still survive.

animals.name: Butterfly
animals.fact: Butterflies can taste with their feet.

animals.name: Zebra
animals.fact: No two zebras have the same stripe pattern.

animals.name: Eel
animals.fact: Electric eels can generate shocks up to 600 volts.

animals.name: Armadillo
animals.fact: Armadillos can roll into a ball for protection.

animals.name: Koala
animals.fact: Koalas sleep up to 20 hours a day.

animals.name: Ostrich
animals.fact: Ostriches have the largest eyes of any land animal.

animals.name: Antelope
animals.fact: Antelopes are some of the fastest land animals.

animals.name: Tapir
animals.fact: Tapirs have long, flexible snouts for grabbing leaves and fruit.

animals.name: Albatross
animals.fact: Albatrosses can fly for hours without flapping their wings.

animals.name: Axolotl
animals.fact: Axolotls can regenerate entire limbs.

animals.name: Beaver
animals.fact: Beavers use their tails for balance, swimming, and communication.

animals.name: Meerkat
animals.fact: Meerkats stand on their hind legs to keep watch for predators.

animals.name: Starfish
animals.fact: Starfish can regrow lost arms.

animals.name: Orangutan
animals.fact: Orangutans are highly intelligent and use tools in the wild.

animals.name: Komodo Dragon
animals.fact: Komodo dragons have venomous bites.

animals.name: Sea Otter
animals.fact: Sea otters hold hands while sleeping to stay together.

animals.name: Macaw
animals.fact: Macaws have strong beaks that can crack nuts.

animals.name: Gazelle
animals.fact: Gazelles can run up to 60 mph to escape predators.

animals.name: Platypus
animals.fact: Platypuses are one of the few mammals that lay eggs.

animals.name: Gecko
animals.fact: Geckos can climb smooth surfaces using specialized toe pads.

animals.name: Woodpecker
animals.fact: Woodpeckers can peck up to 20 times per second.

animals.name: Hawk
animals.fact: Hawks have excellent eyesight for spotting prey.

animals.name: Walrus
animals.fact: Walruses use their tusks to climb out of icy water.

animals.name: Coyote
animals.fact: Coyotes are highly adaptable and can live in urban areas.

animals.name: Salamander
animals.fact: Some salamanders can regrow their tails and limbs.

animals.name: Raven
animals.fact: Ravens are one of the most intelligent birds.

animals.name: Porcupine
animals.fact: Porcupines have quills as a defense mechanism.

animals.name: Pelican
animals.fact: Pelicans have a large pouch under their beak for catching fish.

animals.name: Warthog
animals.fact: Warthogs use their tusks for digging and defense.

animals.name: Toucan
animals.fact: Toucans use their large bills to reach fruit on branches.

animals.name: Seal
animals.fact: Seals can hold their breath for over 30 minutes underwater.

animals.name: Rhinoceros
animals.fact: Rhinoceroses have thick skin that acts as natural armor.

animals.name: Chameleon
animals.fact: Chameleons can change color to blend into their surroundings.

animals.name: Bat
animals.fact: Bats are the only mammals capable of sustained flight.

animals.name: Penguin
animals.fact: Penguins are excellent swimmers and can dive to great depths.

animals.name: Caterpillar
animals.fact: Caterpillars have up to 4,000 muscles in their body.

animals.name: Snake
animals.fact: Some snakes can sense heat through pits near their nostrils.

animals.name: Otter
animals.fact: Otters have the densest fur of any animal.

animals.name: Dragonfly
animals.fact: Dragonflies can fly in all directions, including backward.

animals.name: Bear
animals.fact: Bears have an excellent sense of smell, even better than dogs.

animals.name: Duck
animals.fact: Duck quacks have an echo.

animals.name: Tortoise
animals.fact: Tortoises can live for over 150 years.

animals.name: Crab
animals.fact: Crabs can walk sideways.

animals.name: Hyena
animals.fact: Hyenas have incredibly strong jaws for crushing bones.

animals.name: Flounder
animals.fact: Flounders' eyes migrate to one side of their body as they grow.

animals.name: Vulture
animals.fact: Vultures have stomach acid strong enough to digest bones.

animals.name: Emu
animals.fact: Emus are the second-largest birds in the world.
